    • Method Detail

      • hurt

        public void hurt(int points)
        Do some damage to the Zombie. A 25% probability that the Zombie will loose either its Arm or Leg Lost Arm or Leg will be placed on the adjacent location of the Zombie If the Zombie does not have arms left, it will drop any weapon it is holding
        Overrides:
        hurt in class Actor
        Parameters:
        points - number of hitpoints to deduct.

      • removeHoldingItem

        private void removeHoldingItem()
        A private method that checks whether this Zombie is holding anything, and drop those items.

      • dropItemAdjacent

        private void dropItemAdjacent(Item item)
        Drops an Item on a random adjacent location of this Zombie
        Parameters:
        item - the Item to be dropped

      • isConscious

        public boolean isConscious()
        Checks whether this Zombie is conscious returns true if it sill have at least 1 limb and still have positive hitpoints
        Overrides:
        isConscious in class Actor
        Returns:
        true if and only if it has at least 1 limb and positive hitpoints

      • getIntrinsicWeapon

        public IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
        return an IntrinsicWeapon of this Zombie either a bite or a punch If this Zombie has only one arm left, then it has only 25% probability of punching the target If this Zombie has no arms left, it only can bite the target
        Overrides:
        getIntrinsicWeapon in class Actor
        Returns:
        a freshly-instantiated IntrinsicWeapon

      • playTurn

        public Action playTurn(Actions actions,
                       Action lastAction,
                       GameMap map,
                       Display display)
        If a Zombie can attack, it will. If not, it will chase any human within 10 spaces. If no humans are close enough it will wander randomly. If the Zombie is standing on a Weapon, it can pick that up and use it The Zombie can also say the word "Braaaaains"
        Specified by:
        playTurn in class Actor
        Parameters:
        actions - list of possible Actions
        lastAction - previous Action, if it was a multiturn action
        map - the map where the current Zombie is
        display - the Display where the Zombie's utterances will be displayed
        Returns:
        the Action to be performed
